ja:
<VOICE>(VA070_001)Stand back, Adecor!
<PAGE>
<VOICE>(VA070_002)I'll handle this in the name of
the Imperial Knights.
en:
<VOICE>(VA070_001)Stand back, Adecor!
<PAGE>
<VOICE>(VA070_002)I'll handle this in the name of
the Imperial Knights.

ja:
<VOICE>(VA070_003)I say, I shall be the one to defend the 
good name of the Imperial Knights!
<PAGE>
<VOICE>(VA070_004)Peons, I say, should stand back!
en:
<VOICE>(VA070_003)I say, I shall be the one to defend the 
good name of the Imperial Knights!
<PAGE>
<VOICE>(VA070_004)Peons, I say, should stand back!

ja: <VOICE>(VA070_006)No, no, I say, I am your superior!
en: <VOICE>(VA070_006)No, no, I say, I am your superior!

ja:
<VOICE>(VA070_007)I appreciate the sentiment, 
guys, but let's cut the catfight 
and get on with it!
en:
<VOICE>(VA070_007)I appreciate the sentiment, 
guys, but let's cut the catfight 
and get on with it!

ja:
The control is set to semi-auto
mode during this battle.
en:
The control is set to semi-auto
mode during this battle.

ja:
Move forward and backward with <06>(LTR)<06>(LTL).
Jump with <06>(GUD)＋<06>(LTU).
en:
Move forward and backward with <06>(LTR)<06>(LTL).
Jump with <06>(GUD)＋<06>(LTU).

ja:
Target nearest enemy using <06>(CBR1).
Change your target with <06>(LTN) while 
holding  <06>(CBR1).
en:
Target nearest enemy using <06>(CBR1).
Change your target with <06>(LTN) while 
holding  <06>(CBR1).

ja:
<VOICE>(VA070_010)Nay, Boccos! You are, I say, 
clearly my subordinate!
en:
<VOICE>(VA070_010)Nay, Boccos! You are, I say, 
clearly my subordinate!

ja:
<VOICE>(VA070_011)I guess I just gotta whack 
these guys a little.
en:
<VOICE>(VA070_011)I guess I just gotta whack 
these guys a little.

ja:
You can also perform attacks with <06>(ATK)
while moving with <06>(CBL2)＋<06>(LTN).
en:
You can also perform attacks with <06>(ATK)
while moving with <06>(CBL2)＋<06>(LTN).

ja:
Target will automatically switch 
to the enemy you hit while moving 
with <06>(CBL2)＋<06>(LTN).
en:
Target will automatically switch 
to the enemy you hit while moving 
with <06>(CBL2)＋<06>(LTN).

ja:
<VOICE>(VA070_014)How dare you! Hitting someone in the middle 
of an argument is hardly proper manners!
en:
<VOICE>(VA070_014)How dare you! Hitting someone in the middle 
of an argument is hardly proper manners!

ja:
<VOICE>(VA070_015)Didn't you hear me when I said "You 
ready?" Or were you not listening?
en:
<VOICE>(VA070_015)Didn't you hear me when I said "You 
ready?" Or were you not listening?

ja:
<VOICE>(VA070_025)Oooh! I say, 
how DARE you block 
my arte!
en:
<VOICE>(VA070_025)Oooh! I say, 
how DARE you block 
my arte!

ja:
<VOICE>(VA070_026)Man, you need to calm down...
<PAGE>
<VOICE>(VA070_027)If you can use strike artes 
here, then I can too!
en:
<VOICE>(VA070_026)Man, you need to calm down...
<PAGE>
<VOICE>(VA070_027)If you can use strike artes 
here, then I can too!

ja:
<VOICE>(VA070_028)Let's try that again. This 
next one's gonna hurt...!
en:
<VOICE>(VA070_028)Let's try that again. This 
next one's gonna hurt...!

ja:
Perform combo by using regular attack <06>(ATK)
followed by artes attack <06>(ART).
en:
Perform combo by using regular attack <06>(ATK)
followed by artes attack <06>(ART).

ja:
<VOICE>(VA070_029)Aw, you're not giving 
up already, are you?
en:
<VOICE>(VA070_029)Aw, you're not giving 
up already, are you?

ja: <VOICE>(VA070_030)I-I say, Imperial Knights never give up!
en: <VOICE>(VA070_030)I-I say, Imperial Knights never give up!

ja: <VOICE>(VA070_031)You have yet to see our true power!
en: <VOICE>(VA070_031)You have yet to see our true power!

ja:
<VOICE>(VS03_057)Man, just when I thought I was being sneaky, 
things have to go to hell.
en:
<VOICE>(VS03_057)Man, just when I thought I was being sneaky, 
things have to go to hell.

ja:
<VOICE>(VS03_058)Careful, I think he's 
got a blastia.
en:
<VOICE>(VS03_058)Careful, I think he's 
got a blastia.

ja: <VOICE>(VS03_059)It shouldn't be a problem if we take him together.
en: <VOICE>(VS03_059)It shouldn't be a problem if we take him together.

ja:
<VOICE>(VS03_116)You feel what? I'm not feeling 
anything over here.
en:
<VOICE>(VS03_116)You feel what? I'm not feeling 
anything over here.

ja:
<VOICE>(VS03_119)That's it! That's 
it! Now I feel 
truly alive!
en:
<VOICE>(VS03_119)That's it! That's 
it! Now I feel 
truly alive!

ja: <VOICE>(VS03_120)What's with him all of a sudden?
en: <VOICE>(VS03_120)What's with him all of a sudden?

ja:
<VOICE>(VS03_127)If things get out of 
hand, run for it.
en:
<VOICE>(VS03_127)If things get out of 
hand, run for it.

ja:
<VOICE>(VS03_129)Oh, don't give up so soon. 
I haven't had a fight like 
this in years!
en:
<VOICE>(VS03_129)Oh, don't give up so soon. 
I haven't had a fight like 
this in years!

ja:
Kiss your freedom goodbye, 
for it ends today!
en:
Kiss your freedom goodbye, 
for it ends today!

ja:
I say, prepare to face the Imperial 
Knights' ultimate fighting 
arte, the Over Limit!
en:
I say, prepare to face the Imperial 
Knights' ultimate fighting 
arte, the Over Limit!

ja:
The Over Limit doesn't belong to the Knights! 
Anyone can do it, last time I checked.
en:
The Over Limit doesn't belong to the Knights! 
Anyone can do it, last time I checked.

ja:
It's a technique to increase your abilities 
while fighting. How do you do it again?
en:
It's a technique to increase your abilities 
while fighting. How do you do it again?

ja: You fool! How could you forget something like that?
en: You fool! How could you forget something like that?

ja:
I say, I shall jog your memory!
<PAGE>
But after that, I say, I shall 
give you a non-stop ticket 
on the train of death!
en:
I say, I shall jog your memory!
<PAGE>
But after that, I say, I shall 
give you a non-stop ticket 
on the train of death!

ja:
Oh, right. You attack 
the enemy, and that
raises your battle spirit.
en:
Oh, right. You attack 
the enemy, and that
raises your battle spirit.

ja:
Blast! Your hits are not 
connecting at all!
en:
Blast! Your hits are not 
connecting at all!

ja:
Ouch... I say, that hurt...
I cannot, I say, stand this
any longer...!
en:
Ouch... I say, that hurt...
I cannot, I say, stand this
any longer...!

ja:
Oh yeah, your battle spirit goes 
up if you're attacked, too.
en:
Oh yeah, your battle spirit goes 
up if you're attacked, too.

ja:
The gauge fills up as you attack
or when you receive an attack.
en:
The gauge fills up as you attack
or when you receive an attack.

ja:
All right...and then, if you release the 
battle spirit that you've stored up...
en:
All right...and then, if you release the 
battle spirit that you've stored up...

ja: Press <06>(LBN) to go into Over Limit
en: Press <06>(LBN) to go into Over Limit

ja:
You can use basic attacks and artes
consecutively during an Over Limit.
en:
You can use basic attacks and artes
consecutively during an Over Limit.

ja: We mustn't let his power charge up any more!
en: We mustn't let his power charge up any more!

ja: I've got you just where I want you...
en: I've got you just where I want you...

ja: I think I'll try to do that thing.
en: I think I'll try to do that thing.

ja:
You can't just imitate what you 
saw and hope it'll work...
en:
You can't just imitate what you 
saw and hope it'll work...

ja:
Is it something that
can be done so easily...?
en:
Is it something that
can be done so easily...?

ja:
Hey, I won't know if I can until 
I try. How did it go again?
en:
Hey, I won't know if I can until 
I try. How did it go again?

ja:
Uh, uhh, first, you go 
and attack the enemy to 
throw it off balance...
en:
Uh, uhh, first, you go 
and attack the enemy to 
throw it off balance...

ja:
Um, first you attack
the enemy to throw
it off balance...
en:
Um, first you attack
the enemy to throw
it off balance...

ja: Add an attack and prepare for the Fatal Strike.
en: Add an attack and prepare for the Fatal Strike.

ja:
I see my opening 
to attack!
en:
I see my opening 
to attack!

ja: Press <06>(CBR2) to trigger a Fatal Strike.
en: Press <06>(CBR2) to trigger a Fatal Strike.

ja: Nah, I was just copying what I saw.
en: Nah, I was just copying what I saw.

ja:
I didn't think it was the sort of thing 
you can just copy like that...
en:
I didn't think it was the sort of thing 
you can just copy like that...

ja:
Well, you need a little 
skill, but it's not 
really that hard.
<PAGE>
You think you could do 
it while watching me?
en:
Well, you need a little 
skill, but it's not 
really that hard.
<PAGE>
You think you could do 
it while watching me?

ja:
N-no way! It takes a skilled swordsman 
to do something like that...
en:
N-no way! It takes a skilled swordsman 
to do something like that...

ja:
I know that.
<PAGE>
But <STR>(KAR), you're not 
as bad as you make 
yourself out to be.
en:
I know that.
<PAGE>
But <STR>(KAR), you're not 
as bad as you make 
yourself out to be.

ja:
The amount of EXP, LP, as well
as item drop rates increases when
you defeat an enemy with Fatal Strike.
en:
The amount of EXP, LP, as well
as item drop rates increases when
you defeat an enemy with Fatal Strike.

ja:
Kiss your freedom goodbye, 
for it ends today!
en:
Kiss your freedom goodbye, 
for it ends today!

ja:
I say, prepare to face the 
Imperial Knights' ultimate fighting 
technique: the burst arte!
en:
I say, prepare to face the 
Imperial Knights' ultimate fighting 
technique: the burst arte!

ja:
Again, you're claiming regular 
techniques as your own... That 
doesn't belong to the Knights!
en:
Again, you're claiming regular 
techniques as your own... That 
doesn't belong to the Knights!

ja:
The Burst Arte, huh...
I've heard of it before, but...
en:
The Burst Arte, huh...
I've heard of it before, but...

ja:
You don't know how 
it's done? You fool!
en:
You don't know how 
it's done? You fool!

ja:
I say, we shall show you!
<PAGE>
But before that happens, you'll be 
reduced to no more than a worthless 
caterpillar crawling on the ground!
en:
I say, we shall show you!
<PAGE>
But before that happens, you'll be 
reduced to no more than a worthless 
caterpillar crawling on the ground!

ja:
Maybe it has something 
to do with Over Limit...
en:
Maybe it has something 
to do with Over Limit...

ja:
Go! Show him 
how it's done, 
Adecor!
en:
Go! Show him 
how it's done, 
Adecor!

ja:
I say, watch me now...!
<PAGE>
The arcane arte of 
the Imperial Knights!
en:
I say, watch me now...!
<PAGE>
The arcane arte of 
the Imperial Knights!

ja:
It didn't hit him! 
What are you doing?!
en:
It didn't hit him! 
What are you doing?!

ja:
Huh. Burst artes 
can be linked from 
an arcane arte.
<PAGE>
I wonder if I could imitate that...
en:
Huh. Burst artes 
can be linked from 
an arcane arte.
<PAGE>
I wonder if I could imitate that...

ja:
Ha, there's no way an 
amateur could do 
something like that, I say!
en:
Ha, there's no way an 
amateur could do 
something like that, I say!

ja:
Press <06>(LBN) to go 
into Over Limit.
en:
Press <06>(LBN) to go 
into Over Limit.

ja:
Wah, be careful! 
<STR>(YUR) Lowell's going 
to attack!
en:
Wah, be careful! 
<STR>(YUR) Lowell's going 
to attack!

ja:
...I don't actually know any of 
those, but how about this?!
en:
...I don't actually know any of 
those, but how about this?!

ja:
Trigger a burst arte 
by holding <06>(ART)
after an arcane arte.
en:
Trigger a burst arte 
by holding <06>(ART)
after an arcane arte.

ja:
I say, what a terrible 
turn of events!!
en:
I say, what a terrible 
turn of events!!

ja:
<VOICE>(VS21_174)Aah... I will never 
yield to the likes 
of you!
en:
<VOICE>(VS21_174)Aah... I will never 
yield to the likes 
of you!

ja: <VOICE>(VS27_125)Aren't you cutting it a bit close?
en: <VOICE>(VS27_125)Aren't you cutting it a bit close?

ja:
<VOICE>(VS27_126)Hey, these people didn't pay good 
money to see a rigged fight.
en:
<VOICE>(VS27_126)Hey, these people didn't pay good 
money to see a rigged fight.

ja: <VOICE>(VS27_127)You could at least ease up a little.
en: <VOICE>(VS27_127)You could at least ease up a little.

ja:
<VOICE>(VS27_128)Like you're having any 
trouble blocking me.
en:
<VOICE>(VS27_128)Like you're having any 
trouble blocking me.

ja: <VOICE>(VS27_129)So, care to explain what you're doing here?
en: <VOICE>(VS27_129)So, care to explain what you're doing here?

ja:
<VOICE>(VS27_130)You know, knightly duties and such. 
Afraid that's all I can say.
en:
<VOICE>(VS27_130)You know, knightly duties and such. 
Afraid that's all I can say.

ja:
<VOICE>(VS27_131)Since when is becoming the champion 
of the Coliseum a duty? Especially 
for a captain of the Knights...
en:
<VOICE>(VS27_131)Since when is becoming the champion 
of the Coliseum a duty? Especially 
for a captain of the Knights...

ja:
<VOICE>(VS27_133)I think it's great you're taking your 
promotion so seriously, but be careful you 
don't bite off more than you can chew.
en:
<VOICE>(VS27_133)I think it's great you're taking your 
promotion so seriously, but be careful you 
don't bite off more than you can chew.

ja:
<VOICE>(VS27_134)You're the one taking this seriously. 
It's been a while since I've seen 
you enjoy anything this much.
<PAGE>
<VOICE>(VS27_135)And don't you think it's 
about time you returned 
Her Highness?
en:
<VOICE>(VS27_134)You're the one taking this seriously. 
It's been a while since I've seen 
you enjoy anything this much.
<PAGE>
<VOICE>(VS27_135)And don't you think it's 
about time you returned 
Her Highness?

ja:
<VOICE>(VS27_136)You'll have to take 
that up with the 
lady herself.
en:
<VOICE>(VS27_136)You'll have to take 
that up with the 
lady herself.

ja:
<VOICE>(VS27_137)Her Highness tends not 
to listen to the things 
I tell her.
en:
<VOICE>(VS27_137)Her Highness tends not 
to listen to the things 
I tell her.

ja:
<VOICE>(VS27_138)Yeah, well, Her Highness isn't 
particularly fond of taking 
my advice either.
en:
<VOICE>(VS27_138)Yeah, well, Her Highness isn't 
particularly fond of taking 
my advice either.

ja:
<VOICE>(VS27_139)Well, shall we put an end 
to this little show?
en:
<VOICE>(VS27_139)Well, shall we put an end 
to this little show?

ja:
<VOICE>(VS27_140)How? If we quit now, 
they'll boo us out 
of the building.
en:
<VOICE>(VS27_140)How? If we quit now, 
they'll boo us out 
of the building.

ja: <VOICE>(VB38_0703)Urgh, now you've gone and done it!
en: <VOICE>(VB38_0703)Urgh, now you've gone and done it!

ja:
<VOICE>(VB34_0703)He he he...
I think we're about even now.
en:
<VOICE>(VB34_0703)He he he...
I think we're about even now.

ja:
<VOICE>(VS47_055)I-I've gotta protect them. 
No more running...!
en:
<VOICE>(VS47_055)I-I've gotta protect them. 
No more running...!

ja: <VOICE>(VS49_065)It's no good! She can't hear a thing we're sayin'!!
en: <VOICE>(VS49_065)It's no good! She can't hear a thing we're sayin'!!

ja: <VOICE>(VS49_066)I'll admit, I didn't include this in our gameplan...!
en: <VOICE>(VS49_066)I'll admit, I didn't include this in our gameplan...!

ja: <VOICE>(VS49_070)Can she really not hear us? She has to! Right, <STR>(EST_P)?!
en: <VOICE>(VS49_070)Can she really not hear us? She has to! Right, <STR>(EST_P)?!

ja: <VOICE>(VS49_071)...Man, is this just fate? We can't stop it?!
en: <VOICE>(VS49_071)...Man, is this just fate? We can't stop it?!

ja:
<VOICE>(VS51_054)Well aren't you something? 
I suppose it's time to 
reveal my true power!
en:
<VOICE>(VS51_054)Well aren't you something? 
I suppose it's time to 
reveal my true power!

ja: <VOICE>(VS51_058)Hey, if he tries to use it like that...!
en: <VOICE>(VS51_058)Hey, if he tries to use it like that...!

ja:
<VOICE>(VS51_122)Hey boss, so you 
really want to go 
through with this?
en:
<VOICE>(VS51_122)Hey boss, so you 
really want to go 
through with this?

ja:
<VOICE>(VS51_123)Must I put up with such 
questions even from you?
<PAGE>
<VOICE>(VS51_124)None of you--NONE--thinks 
the empire is in the right.
en:
<VOICE>(VS51_123)Must I put up with such 
questions even from you?
<PAGE>
<VOICE>(VS51_124)None of you--NONE--thinks 
the empire is in the right.

ja:
<VOICE>(VS51_125)The ends don't always 
justify the means, boss. 
These kids taught me that.
en:
<VOICE>(VS51_125)The ends don't always 
justify the means, boss. 
These kids taught me that.

ja:
<VOICE>(VS51_126)...I could never agree with 
your way of doing things, 
a way that is filled with pain.
<PAGE>
<VOICE>(VS51_127)If you truly have no intention 
of changing your ways, then...
en:
<VOICE>(VS51_126)...I could never agree with 
your way of doing things, 
a way that is filled with pain.
<PAGE>
<VOICE>(VS51_127)If you truly have no intention 
of changing your ways, then...

ja:
<VOICE>(VS51_128)The guilds and the empire both 
have good points. You can't just 
wipe them out and start over.
en:
<VOICE>(VS51_128)The guilds and the empire both 
have good points. You can't just 
wipe them out and start over.

ja:
<VOICE>(VS51_129)Using force will surely breed 
resentment and contempt.
<PAGE>
<VOICE>(VS51_130)You do know that, don't you?
en:
<VOICE>(VS51_129)Using force will surely breed 
resentment and contempt.
<PAGE>
<VOICE>(VS51_130)You do know that, don't you?

ja:
<VOICE>(VS51_131)There's no guarantee the 
world you'd make would be 
any better than this one!
en:
<VOICE>(VS51_131)There's no guarantee the 
world you'd make would be 
any better than this one!

ja:
<VOICE>(VS51_132)Nobody's gonna buy what 
a bastard like you says.
en:
<VOICE>(VS51_132)Nobody's gonna buy what 
a bastard like you says.

ja:
<VOICE>(VS51_133)I see my explanations are 
wasted on you. The small-
minded always fear change.
<PAGE>
<VOICE>(VS51_134)However, all the aer in the 
world is now in my grasp. 
You have no hope of victory.
en:
<VOICE>(VS51_133)I see my explanations are 
wasted on you. The small-
minded always fear change.
<PAGE>
<VOICE>(VS51_134)However, all the aer in the 
world is now in my grasp. 
You have no hope of victory.

ja:
<VOICE>(VS51_135)Yeah, right. You're still trying to figure 
out the formula for this place.
en:
<VOICE>(VS51_135)Yeah, right. You're still trying to figure 
out the formula for this place.

ja:
<VOICE>(VS51_137)This guy still hasn't completely 
unlocked Zaude's controls.
en:
<VOICE>(VS51_137)This guy still hasn't completely 
unlocked Zaude's controls.

ja:
<VOICE>(VS51_139)...Ah yes, <STR>(RIT) Mordio. 
How very careless of me.
en:
<VOICE>(VS51_139)...Ah yes, <STR>(RIT) Mordio. 
How very careless of me.

ja:
<VOICE>(VS51_140)Are you serious? And you 
think you can change the 
world? Don't make me laugh.
en:
<VOICE>(VS51_140)Are you serious? And you 
think you can change the 
world? Don't make me laugh.

ja:
<VOICE>(VS51_141)How very right you are.
<PAGE>
<VOICE>(VS51_142)Very well, then this will be 
one more trial along my path 
to my rightful place as ruler.
<PAGE>
<VOICE>(VS51_143)Hnnn!!
en:
<VOICE>(VS51_141)How very right you are.
<PAGE>
<VOICE>(VS51_142)Very well, then this will be 
one more trial along my path 
to my rightful place as ruler.
<PAGE>
<VOICE>(VS51_143)Hnnn!!

ja:
<VOICE>(VS51_150)You will be the first 
sacrifice made for the new 
world's dawn. ...Come!!
en:
<VOICE>(VS51_150)You will be the first 
sacrifice made for the new 
world's dawn. ...Come!!

ja:
<VOICE>(VS51_151)...Whoa, whoa whoa. 
I thought he didn't have 
all of Zaude's power yet?
en:
<VOICE>(VS51_151)...Whoa, whoa whoa. 
I thought he didn't have 
all of Zaude's power yet?

ja:
<VOICE>(VS51_152)He doesn't, but he 
may have enough.
en:
<VOICE>(VS51_152)He doesn't, but he 
may have enough.

ja:
<VOICE>(VS51_153)Heh, he's betting the 
world on this. He's gotta 
pull out all the stops.
<PAGE>
<VOICE>(VS51_154)Let's go!
en:
<VOICE>(VS51_153)Heh, he's betting the 
world on this. He's gotta 
pull out all the stops.
<PAGE>
<VOICE>(VS51_154)Let's go!

ja:
This is definitely
no regular monster...
en:
This is definitely
no regular monster...

ja:
Sometimes it's better to run
when it gets too much.
en:
Sometimes it's better to run
when it gets too much.

ja:
Maybe it's better to
run from this one...
en:
Maybe it's better to
run from this one...

ja: Let's make a run for it..
en: Let's make a run for it..

ja:
It's better to run when
it gets too much.
en:
It's better to run when
it gets too much.

ja:
Let's make a run for it
while we still can.
en:
Let's make a run for it
while we still can.

ja:
My blade is calling...
But I think we better run from this one.
en:
My blade is calling...
But I think we better run from this one.
